text: Nocardiopsis ansamitocini is an alkalitolerant bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from soil from the Xinjiang province in China. Nocardiopsis ansamitocini produces ansamitocin P-3. == References == == External links == *Type strain of Nocardiopsis ansamitocini at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2016
title: Nocardiopsis ansamitocini
